custom.preconds: PC with Windows OC and preinstalled Firefox, Opera, Chrome, Edge browsers
custom.steps: 1) Open site in browsers - Firefox, Opera, Chrome and Edge Browsers. 2) Check site appearance according to provided mockup![](index.php?/attachments/get/36a537e9-3a87-47be-979a-ae496e61020f)
custom.expected: Site is opened and appearance matches the mockup

case.title: Site accordance to Mock-up on all mobile screen resolutions

custom.steps: 1. Go to testing resolutions sites - like http://whatismyscreenresolution.net/multi-screen-test 2. Check the all common resolution from HD to 4k (10 min)
custom.expected: Al elements of the site are visible to human eye and accessible

case.title: Site availability in multiple countries of the world.

custom.steps: 1. Install 3 free vpns of your choice 2. Access the site from at least 10 different countries.
1. Access the SUT 2. Press all the hyperlinks of the Site 3. Check if the hyperlinks are working 4. Check if they are correct (according to developer documentation)
custom.expected: All links are working All links leading to right site

case.title: Site accordance to Mock-up on all desktop screen resolutions

custom.steps: 1. Go to testing resolutions sites - like http://whatismyscreenresolution.net/multi-screen-test 2. Check the all common resolution from HD to 4k (10 min)
custom.expected: Al elements of the site are visible to human eye and accessible

case.title: Site availability in multiple countries of the world.

custom.steps: 1. Install 3 free vpns of your choice 2. Access the site from at least 10 different countries.
1. Access the SUT 2. Press all the hyperlinks of the Site 3. Check if the hyperlinks are working 4. Check if they are correct (according to developer documentation)
custom.expected: All links are working All links leading to right site

custom.steps: 1. Go to site https://alexander-berg.github.io 2. Open the developer tools 3. Go to lighthouse tab 4. Press generate metrics report for Mobile button 5. Press the 3 dots in the right top corner 6. Press generate report, new tab will open 7. You can see the report. Save it as pdf
custom.expected: Report Generated.Please send it to attachemts

custom.preconds: Desktop OC with Chrome or Chromium browser
custom.steps:
Go to site https://alexander-berg.github.io
Open the developer tools
Go to lighthouse tab
Press generate metrics report for Mobile button
Press the 3 dots in the right top corner
Press generate report, new tab will open
You can see the report. Save it as pdf
custom.expected: Report is generated with Google metrics. Please send it to attachments of this test

custom.steps: 1. As our project site doesn't contain any fields and login system and it also protected by github platform, we can only check if the security certificate is valid 2. Go to site https://alexander-berg.github.io 3. Press the "page information" button 4. Go to "connection is secure" section and open it 5. Check the security certificate of the site
custom.expected: You will see message "certificate is valid"

custom.steps: 1. Open the site https://alexander-berg.github.io 2. Check if all elements corresponds to fresh mockup 3. Go to the new added hyperlinks
custom.expected: All visual elements corresponds to fresh makeup All fresh hyperlinks working correctly
